title: Typeface for female photographer
content:
Hello,

My friend who is a photographer, “Miss Kim Parker” has asked me to select a typeface that would represent her and the body of work she produces. Her work consists of musicians, live performances, and musical groups in the reggae genera. She is a wonderful person to be around, very easy-going, and laid back.

Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks You,  
Emily
author: Emily

comments.content:
Stefan

I do like Oxtail – it has unique charcteristic that make it stop out just like her. Hopefully she will like it as well.

I would like to show her more then one typeface.Do you happen to know of any san serif fonts that might work in the same manner. Thanks agiain.

Emily

Thanks for kind words on Oxtail. Apart from my own STALEMATE and SOPHISTO, there are some other nice ones: FF STRADA and FF SCALA SANS, both from FontShop...  
 [http://www.fontshop.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20091008013737/http:/www.fontshop.com/ "http://www.fontshop.com"). Another favourite at the moment is LISBOA from Fountain...  
 [http://www.fountain.nu](http://web.archive.org/web/20091008013737/http:/www.fountain.nu/ "http://www.fountain.nu")
